participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, enjoys discussing finance and business strategies.
participant_1.background: i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and creative, loves expressing themselves through music and gaming.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
